pages.text: Whenever a Vagrant utilizes a 'skill' or hides/unhides, they begin to shed small flakes of flesh from their bodies. During this 'Cooldown', they appear to be incapable of performing any other skill, or hiding/unhiding.

This could be a sort of recovery process, or could be a byproduct of strain due to performing the skill. $(br2)It is not to be confused with the global Evolution Cooldown that the parasites will undergo.

$(#630000)That reminds me, I can still gain Points Contributed (the small bar below my biomass counter) during the global cooldown, as long as my points don't exceed that of the rest of the parasites. It doesn't actually add any Evolution Points, though.
